body: So I read ivy's post about maintenance and that was yesterday, so is the maintenance still going because it keeps saying "Can not connect to server".
body_tagged: So I read ivy's post about maintenance and that was yesterday, so is the maintenance still going because it keeps saying "Can not connect to server".
title: Server Down

replies.body: Yes Please be patient, The development team is working on it.
